content: i used dk weight acrylic yarn in 4 different colors but you can choose the kind of dk yarn you like most you can change colors in every round or use just one color there aren t rules i ve used 123 gr - 327 metres 4 mm hook or any hooks to meet the gauge needle scissors tape measure this balaclava fits an adult but you can make any other sizes using smaller granny squares the final width is approx 28cm the final length is approx 40cm this pattern is customizable and you can add extra length or width as you like
